items.name: Iron Shield [Uncommon]_shiny
items.flavor_text: Has seen battle. Has also seen you trip over it.

items.name: Healing Potion [Common]
items.flavor_text: Guaranteed to work. Not guaranteed to taste like anything remotely edible.

items.name: Iron Shield [Uncommon]
items.flavor_text: Has seen battle. Has also seen you trip over it.

items.name: Cracked Goblin Tooth [Common]
items.flavor_text: You could throw it away. You won’t. That’s who you are now.

items.name: Sock of Slight Warmth [Common]_shiny
items.flavor_text: Sometimes whispers: “we could be slippers,” and then sighs.

items.name: Healing Potion [Common]
items.flavor_text: Guaranteed to work. Not guaranteed to taste like anything remotely edible.

items.name: Iron Shield [Uncommon]
items.flavor_text: Has seen battle. Has also seen you trip over it.

items.name: Wooden Sword [Common]
items.flavor_text: Warning: may summon memories of being eight years old and unstoppable.

items.name: Healing Potion [Common]_shiny
items.flavor_text: Guaranteed to work. Not guaranteed to taste like anything remotely edible.

items.name: Potion of Almost Invisibility [Uncommon]
items.flavor_text: Makes you mostly transparent... but only your butt.

items.name: Spectacles of Overthinking [Rare]
items.flavor_text: See all possible outcomes. Panic accordingly.

items.name: Cracked Goblin Tooth [Common]
items.flavor_text: You could throw it away. You won’t. That’s who you are now.

items.name: Pocket Lint [Common]
items.flavor_text: “Pocket Sand’s" disappointing cousin.

items.name: Rusty Spoon of Minor Stirring [Common]_shiny
items.flavor_text: Sometimes it stirs on its own. Don’t acknowledge it. It likes attention.

items.name: Healing Potion [Common]
items.flavor_text: Guaranteed to work. Not guaranteed to taste like anything remotely edible.

items.name: Healing Potion [Common]_shiny
items.flavor_text: Guaranteed to work. Not guaranteed to taste like anything remotely edible.

items.name: Rusty Spoon of Minor Stirring [Common]
items.flavor_text: Sometimes it stirs on its own. Don’t acknowledge it. It likes attention.

items.name: Speed Boots [Uncommon]
items.flavor_text: Only activates when your arms are doing the little angry swings.

items.name: Iron Shield [Uncommon]_shiny
items.flavor_text: Has seen battle. Has also seen you trip over it.

items.name: Iron Shield [Uncommon]
items.flavor_text: Has seen battle. Has also seen you trip over it.

items.name: Wooden Sword [Common]
items.flavor_text: Warning: may summon memories of being eight years old and unstoppable.

items.name: Speed Boots [Uncommon]_shiny
items.flavor_text: Only activates when your arms are doing the little angry swings.

items.name: Phoenix Feather [Epic]
items.flavor_text: Cures poison. Side effect: your burps taste like smoke.

items.name: Mystic Blade [Rare]
items.flavor_text: Gleams heroically even in total darkness. Show-off.

items.name: Wooden Sword [Common]_shiny
items.flavor_text: Warning: may summon memories of being eight years old and unstoppable.

items.name: Mystic Blade [Rare]_shiny
items.flavor_text: Gleams heroically even in total darkness. Show-off.

items.name: Amulet of Time [Epic]
items.flavor_text: Warning: may cause sudden flashbacks to things you “definitely didn’t say like that.”

items.name: Sock of Slight Warmth [Common]
items.flavor_text: Sometimes whispers: “we could be slippers,” and then sighs.

items.name: Potion of Almost Invisibility [Uncommon]
items.flavor_text: Makes you mostly transparent... but only your butt.

items.name: Cursed Mirror Shard [Uncommon]
items.flavor_text: Once per day, shows you what an object was used for last. Side effect: you learn things you cannot unlearn.

items.name: Gnomish Compass [Uncommon]
items.flavor_text: Points toward the nearest pub. Always.

items.name: Pocket Sand [Common]
items.flavor_text: Coarse, irritating, and gets everywhere.

items.name: Mirror of Unexpected Encouragement [Epic]
items.flavor_text: Tells you you’re doing great... even when you're not.

achievements.title: 5 Years_event
achievements.description: Celebrating 5 years as an Affiliate on twitch!

items.name: Potion of Almost Invisibility [Uncommon]
items.flavor_text: Makes you mostly transparent... but only your butt.

items.name: Mystic Blade [Rare]_shiny
items.flavor_text: Gleams heroically even in total darkness. Show-off.

items.flavor_text: Sometimes it stirs on its own. Don’t acknowledge it. It likes attention.

items.name: Cursed Mirror Shard [Uncommon]
items.flavor_text: Once per day, shows you what an object was used for last. Side effect: you learn things you cannot unlearn.

items.name: Spectacles of Overthinking [Rare]
items.flavor_text: See all possible outcomes. Panic accordingly.

items.name: Cursed Plush of Encouragement [Epic]
items.flavor_text: Whispers supportively... in Infernal.

items.name: Gnomish Compass [Uncommon]
items.flavor_text: Points toward the nearest pub. Always.

items.name: Rusty Spoon of Minor Stirring [Common]
items.flavor_text: Sometimes it stirs on its own. Don’t acknowledge it. It likes attention.

items.name: Cracked Goblin Tooth [Common]
items.flavor_text: You could throw it away. You won’t. That’s who you are now.

items.name: Bag of Holding... Grudges [Uncommon]
items.flavor_text: Once per day: produces exactly the right tool. Also produces a petty remark in your own handwriting.

items.name: Cape of Dramatic Wind [Rare]
items.flavor_text: Blows even indoors. Great for exits.

items.flavor_text: Coarse, irritating, and gets everywhere.

items.name: Speed Boots [Uncommon]
items.flavor_text: Only activates when your arms are doing the little angry swings.

items.name: Rusty Spoon of Minor Stirring [Common]
items.flavor_text: Sometimes it stirs on its own. Don’t acknowledge it. It likes attention.

items.name: Cracked Goblin Tooth [Common]
items.flavor_text: You could throw it away. You won’t. That’s who you are now.

items.name: Pocket Lint [Common]
items.flavor_text: “Pocket Sand’s" disappointing cousin.

items.name: Speed Boots [Uncommon]_shiny
items.flavor_text: Only activates when your arms are doing the little angry swings.

items.name: Potion of Almost Invisibility [Uncommon]
items.flavor_text: Makes you mostly transparent... but only your butt.

items.name: Cracked Goblin Tooth [Common]

items.name: Ring of Insight [Rare]
items.flavor_text: If you ask a question aloud, it answers in a way that makes you look stupid for asking.

items.name: Healing Potion [Common]
items.flavor_text: Guaranteed to work. Not guaranteed to taste like anything remotely edible.

items.flavor_text: Points toward the nearest pub. Always.

items.name: Pocket Sand [Common]
items.flavor_text: Coarse, irritating, and gets everywhere.

items.name: Rusty Spoon of Minor Stirring [Common]
items.flavor_text: Sometimes it stirs on its own. Don’t acknowledge it. It likes attention.

items.name: Bag of Holding... Grudges [Uncommon]
items.flavor_text: Once per day: produces exactly the right tool. Also produces a petty remark in your own handwriting.

items.name: Spectacles of Overthinking [Rare]
items.flavor_text: See all possible outcomes. Panic accordingly.

items.name: Potion of Almost Invisibility [Uncommon]
items.flavor_text: Makes you mostly transparent... but only your butt.

items.name: Iron Shield [Uncommon]
items.flavor_text: Has seen battle. Has also seen you trip over it.

items.name: Cursed Mirror Shard [Uncommon]
items.flavor_text: Once per day, shows you what an object was used for last. Side effect: you learn things you cannot unlearn.

items.name: Wooden Sword [Common]
items.flavor_text: Warning: may summon memories of being eight years old and unstoppable.

items.name: Mystic Blade [Rare]
items.flavor_text: Gleams heroically even in total darkness. Show-off.

items.name: Phoenix Feather [Epic]
items.flavor_text: Cures poison. Side effect: your burps taste like smoke.
